wikipedia_page.main: Timothy Joseph Clarke (born 19 September 1968 in Stourbridge, England) is an English former footballer and now goalkeeper coach.

response: He became Harriers number one soon after, going on to play over 150 times for the Aggborough club. He won the Conference title with Harriers in 2000-2001 - despite having to battle for the number one jersey with the vastly experienced Tim Clarke - and made twenty six appearances as they romped to the title.

response: Timothy or Tim Clarke may also refer to:
